metadata.name: Control Panel Items
metadata.comment: Detects the malicious use of a control panel item

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\reg.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('reg.exe') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('add')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('currentversion\\\\control panel\\\\cpls')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.cpl')) AND NOT (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\\\system32\\\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('%system%')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('|c:\\\\windows\\\\system32|')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('regsvr32 ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /s ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('igfxcpl.cpl')))))

output.summary: Detects the malicious use of a control panel item
